channel.title: Unable to change Char Info
channel.description: Ok so here, I make my character on server and than i close the server down and I change my account rights to 4 or 5 [Owner] and I tryed 3 for admin and 2 for mod also, SO I also change stats but when I save and than reopen server and log back it, as SOON as I log in, the account info goes back to what it was in the first place, even if I make a account from the same txt folder as a Owner account but change name, when I connect on it it is like if it would not le me make myself something els. If you know how to fix, plz help

item.title: Unable to change Char Info
item.dc:creator: @P.o.w.e.r P.o.w.e.r
item.description:
@P.o.w.e.r wrote:

Ok so here, I make my character on server and than i close the server down and I change my account rights to 4 or 5 [Owner] and I tryed 3 for admin and 2 for mod also, SO I also change stats but when I save and than reopen server and log back it, as SOON as I log in, the account info goes back to what it was in the first place, even if I make a account from the same txt folder as a Owner account but change name, when I connect on it it is like if it would not le me make myself something els. If you know how to fix, plz help

Read full topic
